title: Barbecued radicchio and halloumi salad
ingredients: ['For the Greek dressing', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 tablespoon white wine vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 tablespoon finely chopped shallot', '1 tablespoon fresh oregano leaves, or 1 teaspoon dried oregano', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', 'salt and ground black pepper', 'For the salad', '1 radicchio', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or as needed', '1 (250g) packet halloumi cheese, sliced', '3 tablespoons pine nut kernels', '3 spring onions, sliced']
